Handling pure Oxygen and/or compressed gas is dangerous so make sure that you know exactly what you are doing before performing any activity

Vance Harlow's OXYGEN HACKER'S COMPANION book (airspeedpress.com) is a great start.

Tech Diving Mag - issue 11 also has an article on Continuous Gas Blending Using Double Oxygen Analyzer.

Source code, schematics, gerber files, firmware and some useful tips can be found on https://github.com/JureZelic/TrimixMix

This version of TrimixMix only supports oxygen first mixing mode. If Helium first mode is needed please contact the developer.
